What are the treatments for 3-beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of 3-beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase deficiency:  - Genetic Testing Registry: 3 beta-Hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase deficiency  - Great Ormond Street Hospital for Children: Cortisol Deficiency
